official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to make permanent the exclusion from gross income for amounts received under qualified group legal services plans.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the exclusion from the gross income of employees for amounts paid by the employer to provide legal services.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to make permanent the exclusion from gross income for amounts received under qualified group legal services plans.
